grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 三昧【サンマイ】samadhi (state of intense concentration achieved through meditation), being immersed in, being absorbed in, indulging in, doing to one's heart's content, prone to, apt to
蒙昧【モウマイ】ignorance, (lack of) enlightenment or civilization (civilisation), unenlightened, uncivilized, uncivilised
